class_abilities.name: Second Wind
class_abilities.description: Regain HP equal to 1d10 + level. Once per short rest.

class_abilities.name: Action Surge
class_abilities.description: Take an additional action this turn. Once per short rest.

class_abilities.name: Sneak Attack
class_abilities.description: Deal extra damage when you have advantage or ally is adjacent. Scales with level.

class_abilities.name: Cunning Action
class_abilities.description: Use a bonus action to Dash, Disengage, or Hide.

class_abilities.name: Evasion
class_abilities.description: Take no damage on successful DEX save, half on failure.

class_abilities.name: Divine Intervention
class_abilities.description: Call upon your deity for aid. Chance equal to level %. Once per long rest.

class_abilities.name: Channel Divinity: Preserve Life
class_abilities.description: Heal allies within range for HP equal to 5x cleric level, distributed as you choose.

class_abilities.name: Turn Undead
class_abilities.description: Undead must make WIS save or flee for 1 minute.

class_abilities.name: Arcane Recovery
class_abilities.description: Recover spell slots with combined level up to half your wizard level (rounded up). Once per day.

class_abilities.name: Spell Mastery
class_abilities.description: Cast a 1st or 2nd level spell at will without using a slot.

class_abilities.name: Hunter's Mark
class_abilities.description: Mark a target for +1d6 damage on your attacks. Concentration, lasts 1 hour.

class_abilities.name: Natural Explorer
class_abilities.description: Advantage on initiative. Cannot be surprised while conscious.

class_abilities.name: Favored Enemy
class_abilities.description: +2 damage against your chosen enemy type.

class_abilities.name: Multiattack
class_abilities.description: Make two attacks instead of one when taking the Attack action.
